title: pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working

replies.body:
Patcher Kernel errors are often caused by League missing certain administrative privileges that it relies on to run properly. I recommend working through the steps in our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to ensure League has the right configurations. 

Let me know if those steps caused any noticeable changes.
